original_text: And they sat with him on the ground seven days and seven nights, and no one spoke a word to him, for they saw that his suffering was very great.
korean_text: 밤낮 칠 일 동안 그와 함께 땅에 앉았으나 욥의 고통이 심함을 보므로 그에게 한마디도 말하는 자가 없었더라

sentences.original_text: And they sat with him on the ground
and no one spoke a word to him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아무도 그에게 말을 하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: that his suffering was very great.
